price: (Zulqarnayn) ni jedhe: “Kun rahmata Gooftaa kiyya irraa ta’e, Yeroo waadaan Gooftaa kiyyaa dhufe, bittinnaa’aa isa godha, Waadaan Gooftaa kiyyaa dhugaa ta’eera.”
arabic: قَالَ هَٰذَا رَحۡمَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّيۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّي جَعَلَهُۥ دَكَّآءَۖ وَكَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّي حَقّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla hādhā raḥmatun min rabbī fa-idhā jāa waʿdu rabbī jaʿalahu dakkāa wakāna waʿdu rabbī ḥaqqan
